info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 12:22AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Duval and southeastern Webb Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1221 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thompsonville, or 19 miles west of Hebbronville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bruni and Mirando City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
